author: Jack Hirsh
title: This was when Smylie Kaufman realized he was meant to be broadcaster
text: Smylie Kaufman is just 32 years old, but this spring, it will have been two years since his last PGA Tour start. Even longer, five years since the last time he played on the weekend. Pursuing a professional golf career just isn’t in the cards anymore for the [2015 Shriners Hospitals for Children Open winner](https://golf.com/news/smylie-kaufman-win-grandmother-scolded/) as he’s now starting his second season roaming the fairways as an on-course reporter for NBC. But as Kaufman told GOLF senior writer Dylan Dethier in the most recent episode of [Breakthrough](https://golf.com/news/smylie-kaufman-masters-turning-point-breakthrough/) — [you can watch in full here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3y22tao3fT8) — while he was playing in college at LSU, he never really envisioned himself on the PGA Tour. “I wasn’t somebody that had that belief in college,” he said. “I just wanted maybe an opportunity to play an event.” In his own words, he outdid his expectations when he won in Vegas during just his fifth start on the PGA Tour. More than eight years later, he has no regrets about a playing career that is now largely behind him. But when the putts stopped falling, he eventually started looking for other work and landed an opportunity to call the PGA Championship at Southern Hills in 2022. He said that was the first time he felt comfortable and he didn’t have to look over his shoulder. “I felt my anxiety was lifted,” Kaufman said. “I felt like my personality woke up again.” But then there was another moment at last fall’s Ryder Cup in Rome when Kaufman really knew he was doing exactly what he was meant to be doing. “I’m walking down the first fairway and my wife was up there, she came for the week, and it was so cool to see her and then just walk up the fairway and I was literally tearing up and emotional,” said Kaufman, who claimed it was a rare moment of sentiment for him. “I was like, ‘This is exactly where I’m supposed to be.'” For more from Kaufman, including his mistake in U.S. Open prep, playing in the final pairing on Masters Sunday ( [and the movie he watched beforehand](https://golf.com/news/smylie-kaufman-regrets-watching-this-movie-masters/)), the frustrations he dealt with while trying to find his game and more, click on the [YouTube link below](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3y22tao3fT8).

author: MARCUS CHANDLER
title: Give your life to Jesus while there's still time
text:
1 Thessalonians 4:16-18 states, “For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so, shall we ever be with the Lord. Wherefore comfort one another with these words.”
Are you ready for Jesus to return? I often think about how corrupt the world is and the number of people who follow the pattern of the world. Some may think I am judging; however, I am not. I am here to let you know if you are walking after the patterns of this world, you are not following Jesus and you are heading down the wrong road. There are only two roads we can travel – the road that leads to everlasting life in heaven or the road to eternal damnation in fire called hell. Both roads are never ending, but one will lead to never ending torment, while the other leads to eternal bliss. Lately, I have been talking about heaven and hell. We must understand they are real places, and we will live in one or the other when we leave this Earth.

author: PA News Agency
title: Off-road drivers were swept away by river, says man who tried to save them | Eastern Daily Press
text: A man who tried to save three men trapped in a submerged 4×4 vehicle said they were “swept away” as they attempted to cross a river. Emergency services including police, ambulance and a helicopter attended a location on the River Esk near Glaisdale shortly before midday on Thursday. A 4×4 was recovered from the river by the fire service just after 3pm and three men found inside had died, North Yorkshire Police said. Chris Ford, who lives nearby, told the PA news agency the men were part of an off-roading group when they crossed a ford on Rake Lane. The river, swollen by heavy rain, swept them away and carried them around 400 yards downstream, he said. It came as Storm Gerrit caused flooding and travel chaos across the country throughout Wednesday and Thursday. Mr Ford, a firewood salesman, was called to the scene to help recover the vehicle with his tractor and found it fully submerged beneath the water, he said. He and two others used tractors to pull the 4×4 on to the riverbank, he said. Police said another man, who attempted to help those trapped in the car, was pulled from the river and needed medical treatment. Mr Ford told PA: “There was a ford they were going over and they were swept down 400 yards. “They were part of an off-road club. “I went down with my tractor. There was a couple of vehicles – one parked up. “You couldn’t see the (other) vehicle. It was 3ft beneath the water. “I helped get it out on to the riverbank with three other tractors.” Two other locals, Rosie and Andrew Dale, said they were with Mr Ford when he got the call to help. They said they saw several 4×4 vehicles pass their home in the direction of the ford shortly before the incident. Mrs Dale said “nobody local” would attempt to cross the ford in the current conditions. The area is popular with 4×4 drivers, she said, adding: “In the summer you get 10 of them at a time.” A spokesperson for North Yorkshire Police said: “Localised conditions across our area are making driving hazardous. “Roads are particularly badly affected around the River Esk, to the north of the county, as we have seen with the tragic incident near Glaisdale. “There was another incident at nearby Houlsyke at 12.49pm when a car got stuck in flood water and another at Kirby Wiske in Hambleton at 2.35pm. “Thankfully, the occupants of both vehicles were brought to safety. “The key advice is to consider whether your journey is necessary. “Please avoid driving through any kind of standing or moving flood water if you possibly can.” Witnesses to the incident at Glaisdale are urged to call North Yorkshire Police on 101, option 4, quoting reference NYP-28122023-0146.

author: Larissa Silva
title: Sudeste rompe ciclo de seca com chuvas intensas!
text: Após meses marcados por calor intenso e seca, a região Sudeste do Brasil volta a presenciar chuvas significativas. Estados como São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Espírito Santo e Minas Gerais, que vinham enfrentando escassez de precipitações desde abril, experimentam agora um alívio nas condições climáticas. Essa mudança ocorre devido à atuação de fenômenos meteorológicos que reverteram o cenário de estiagem prolongada. O que causou a mudança no padrão climático na região? A transformação no padrão climático na região deve-se à ação conjunta de um cavado, uma área de baixa pressão atmosférica, e a passagem de uma frente fria. Esses sistemas meteorológicos proporcionaram o aumento da umidade, essencial para o retorno das chuvas. A previsão indica que esses fenômenos continuarão a alterar o clima nos próximos dias, possibilitando a manutenção das precipitações na região. Quais cidades registraram chuvas significativas recentemente? Com a chegada das chuvas, diversas cidades apresentam acumulados significativos de precipitação. Em Cananéia, no estado de São Paulo, foram registrados 18,9 mm; em Petrópolis, no Rio de Janeiro, 25,2 mm; em Padre Paraíso, Minas Gerais, 85 mm; e em Serra, no Espírito Santo, 73,9 mm de chuva. Belo Horizonte, a capital mineira, também recebeu precipitações relevantes, encerrando 171 dias sem chuvas expressivas. Qual foi a temperatura recorde em Belo Horizonte? Antes do início das chuvas, o Sudeste vivenciou temperaturas recordes. Na terça-feira, 8 de outubro, Belo Horizonte registrou a temperatura máxima de 36,2°C, conforme dados do Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia. Este número representa um ponto alto nas medições de temperatura da cidade para 2024, refletindo as condições extremas enfrentadas antes do retorno das chuvas. Qual é a previsão do tempo para os próximos dias no Sudeste? A previsão meteorológica para os próximos dias indica que as chuvas continuarão a ocorrer na região Sudeste. A aproximação de uma nova frente fria sugere que áreas como o norte do Rio de Janeiro, sul do Espírito Santo e partes de Minas Gerais poderão registrar volumes de precipitação acima de 60 mm. Este padrão climático contribui para a diminuição das temperaturas e marca o início de um período mais ameno e úmido, típico da primavera na região. Com a continuidade das condições meteorológicas atuais, espera-se que o Sudeste possa se beneficiar de um equilíbrio climático, reduzindo efeitos adversos da longa seca e estabilizando os níveis de umidade essenciais para o bem-estar da população e da agricultura. Siga a gente no Google Notícias

author: VNExplorer
title: Los alumnos evacuados rinden homenaje a su amigo fallecido el 7 de octubre en fiesta de graduación
text: Published: Sun, 23 Jun 2024 08:43:41 GMT Clip que muestra a estudiantes de Secundaria honrando a su compañero asesinado el 7 de octubre, 22 de junio de 2024. (photo credit:screenshot) Las escuelas secundarias israelíes tradicionalmente celebran una fiesta de graduación, a diferencia de las comunes en EE. UU. y en el extranjero. Estudiantes de 12º grado de la Escuela Secundaria Nofei ha-Bsor en el Kibbutz Magen rindieron homenaje a su compañera de clase Mor Meir, quien fue asesinada junto a su padre, Doron, el 7 de octubre, recreando su último baile en TikTok. En una publicación de Instagram, se ve a los estudiantes recreando el último baile que Mor publicó en TikTok, con el video reproduciéndose en segundo plano. Dos estudiantes sostenían un cartel que decía "un ángel para todo el grado", y el video estaba titulado "no hay ojo seco" y "12º grado en su baile de graduación con Mor Meir". Fiesta de graduación de secundaria Las escuelas secundarias israelíes tradicionalmente celebran fiestas de graduación, a diferencia de las comunes en EE. UU. y en el extranjero. En lugar de eso, su fiesta de graduación es donde los estudiantes reciben sus certificados de graduación y luego realizan un espectáculo elaborado, con actuaciones, canto y baile para sus profesores, familias y amigos. La fiesta de graduación de este año se llevó a cabo en el Mar Muerto, adonde los estudiantes fueron evacuados después de que ya no era seguro quedarse en sus comunidades cerca de la frontera con Gaza. Varios estudiantes también perdieron familiares, incluyendo a Yuval Sharabi, cuyo padre fue asesinado y cuyo tío fue secuestrado, Yam Avni, quien también perdió a su padre, así como otros que perdieron varios familiares. El director Eyal Davori dijo a Ynet: "Todos perdieron familiares, amigos y seres queridos, y ahora marcan un hito significativo en un mundo que se ha vuelto del revés". Shiri, la hermana de Mor, dijo: "Por supuesto, estuve en la ceremonia y no sabía que sus amigos estaban planeando hacer el baile. Fue una sorpresa completa y emocionante". "Mor iba a graduarse del duodécimo grado este año. Filmó el baile con otra compañera de clase al principio del año y planeaba presentarlo al final del año". "Finalmente, sus amigos decidieron proyectar el baile y bailarlo en el escenario. Fue emocionante y loco. Me sorprendí y empecé a llorar después de mucho tiempo sin hacerlo. Son campeones y lo hicieron perfectamente".

author: Johannes Mönch
title: Amok-Prävention: Kölner Schule testet App für rechtzeitige Warnung
text:
Um bei einem Amoklauf möglichst schnell Alarm schlagen zu können, haben zwei Lehrer eine App entwickelt. Auch eine Kölner Schule testet sie.
SicherheitsdebatteKölner Schule testet App für Warnung bei Amoklage
Johannes Mönch
Nach dem Amoklauf am Grazer Bundesoberstufenrealgymnasium stellt sich nicht nur in Österreich, sondern auch hierzulande die Frage nach den Sicherheitsvorkehrungen an Schulen. Nützlich könnte die „Amsos-App“ sein, die zwei Lehrer aus Düsseldorf programmiert haben.
„Ganz ehrlich, der Amoklauf-Notfallplan ist bei den meisten Schulen in Deutschland nicht praktikabel“, befindet Ali Badre Eddine. Er ist Lehrer am Düsseldorfer Leo-Statz-Berufskolleg und hat gemeinsam mit seinem Kollegen Khalid Ebanhesaten eine App entwickelt, durch die Lehrkräfte in Sekundenschnelle auf Gefahren hinweisen können.
Keine verpflichtenden Amokübungen
Damit sich potenzielle Amoktäter nicht gezielt vorbereiten können, sind die vorgesehenen Schutzmaßnahmen und Handlungsempfehlungen, die das NRW-Schulministerium in einem Notfallordner bereitstellt, nicht öffentlich einsehbar. Geregelt ist aber zum Beispiel, wem im Krisenfall welche Aufgaben zufallen. Laut Bezirksregierung muss die jeweilige Schulleitung dafür Sorge tragen, „dass alle an der Schule Tätigen über den Notfallordner informiert sind“. Amokübungen seien hingegen nicht verpflichtend, um die Schülerinnen und Schülern nicht zu verunsichern. An einigen Kölner Schulen existieren „Amoktaster“ im Gebäude, mit denen Hilfe herbeigerufen werden kann.
Alles zum Thema Polizei Köln
„Kölner Drogenkrieg“ Geiselnehmer mit Geständnis – Verpasste Geburt des Sohnes sei „größte Strafe“Kostenlos Kölner Polizei bildet Arztpraxen in digitaler Sicherheit fortGefährliches Überholmanöver Kölner Raser schert in Kurve in Opladen aus Hochzeitskorso ausVerkehrsstörungen erwartet Fahrrad-Sternfahrt rollt durch Köln – auch Starts in der RegionAnwalt spricht von „Räuberpistole“ Wie verschwand die Platin-Rolex aus dem Kölner Steakhaus?Köln-Dellbrück Mordkommission ermittelt – Frau soll Ehemann mit Messer verletzt habenSchwere Kopfverletzungen 29-Jähriger bewusstlos in Kölner Altstadt gefunden – Polizei sucht Zeugen
Zwar verfüge jede Schule über einen Notfallordner für akute Krisensituationen, räumt Badre Eddine ein, aber von einer solchen müsse das Sekretariat erstmal erfahren. „Im Falle eines Amoklaufs lässt keine Lehrkraft die Klasse allein, schon wegen der Aufsichtspflicht nicht“, erklärt der App-Entwickler.
App gegen die Furcht vor Fehlalarm
Die „Amsos-App“ ermöglicht es, einen stillen Alarm auszulösen, der direkt an die Schulleitung gesendet wird. „Sie erhält eine Push-Benachrichtigung auf dem Smartphone, auch wenn das Handy im Lautlos-, Nicht stören- oder Flugmodus ist“, erklärt der 38-Jährige. Die Funktionsweise sei mit der Nina-Warn-App vergleichbar. Der Vorteil: Die Entscheidung über einen offiziellen Notruf liege bei der Schulleitung oder dem Sicherheitsbeauftragten. „Viele Lehrkräfte haben Hemmungen, den vorgesehenen Notfallplan und womöglich einen nicht nötigen Großeinsatz der Polizei in Gang zu setzen“, sagt Badre Eddine, der Mitglied im Krisen- und Interventionsteam am Düsseldorfer Leo-Statz-Berufskolleg ist.
Da gehe es vor allem um Haftungsfragen, führt er aus. Dieser Respekt ist aber unbegründet: „Lieber einmal zu viel alarmieren, als einmal zu wenig“, sei der eindeutige Tenor, den er in Gesprächen mit Polizisten wahrnehme. Eine Lehrkraft müsse im Ernst- oder Verdachtsfall nur drei Sekunden lang einen Button drücken, die Verantwortung gebe sie an die dafür vorgesehenen Instanzen ab, so Badre Eddine. Für die App brauche es lediglich Zugang zu Wlan oder dem Mobilfunknetz. Im Übrigen sei diese nur als Ergänzung zu den bestehenden Sicherheitsvorkehrungen gedacht. „Es geht vor allem um die schnelle und einheitliche Informationsverbreitung an alle Lehrkräfte im Schulgebäude“, sagt er.
Zurzeit werde die über zwei Jahre entwickelte App an sieben Schulen in Nordrhein-Westfalen getestet, berichtet Badre Eddine. Das Interesse sei sehr groß. Eine dieser Schulen liegt im Stadtbezirk Rodenkirchen. Auf Anfrage des „Kölner Stadt-Anzeiger“ wollte sich dort kein Verantwortlicher zu bisherigen Erfahrungen und dem Entschluss, die App auszuprobieren, äußern, da die Testphase gerade erst anlaufe.

author: @Thearoged
title: Crystal Dynamics again reduces employees against the background of restructuring - Aroged
text:
Crystal Dynamics studio, known for Tomb Raider and Deus Ex, announced About the new round of dismissals. As part of the restructuring of the work of the studio, 17 people remained without work.
“This morning, Crystal Dynamics made a difficult decision to reduce the staff of 17 talented employees,” the company said in an official statement. Representatives of the studio emphasized that dismissal is not related to the professional qualities of the victims, but are a forced measure to comply with modern business realities.
The injured employees were offered support packages and assistance in finding a new job. Despite the changes, Crystal Dynamics assures that it continues to actively work on current projects, including the next part of the Tomb Raider, although there is very little information about it.
It is worth noting that these are not the first abbreviations in Crystal Dynamics – in 2023 the studio was already experiencing a similar crisis. Since then, she has not had large releases, which only confirms the difficult situation within the company.

author: Contributing Editor
title: One Dead, Two in Critical Condition from Boyle Heights Fire
text:
One person was killed and two were hospitalized in critical condition after being found inside a burning one-story home in Boyle Heights early Thursday morning.
Fire crews responded at 4:24 a.m. Thursday to 742 S. St. Louis St., at Boyle Avenue and east of the Golden State (5) Freeway, where they found the residence consumed with flames, said Los Angeles Fire Department spokeswoman Margaret Stewart.
One of the residence’s occupants was found outside on the porch and pronounced dead at the scene, Stewart said.
During a search of the building, firefighters located two victims and pulled them out in critical condition. Paramedics took them to a hospital, Stewart said.
Two other residents of the home were outside when firefighters arrived and were evaluated for any injuries.
A total of 54 firefighters were able to contain and extinguish the fire in 25 minutes, Stewart said.
As is department protocol, LAFD’s Arson Investigation Section will be in charge of investigating the cause of the fire.
